amendment.description: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to make improvements in the national coverage determination process to respond to changes in technology.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1074 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1074 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S8681; text: CR S8681) To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to make improvements in the national coverage determination process to respond to changes in technology.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1074 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Coleman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1074 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
